text: Masjid Al-Abdul Razak is a comfortable and welcoming mosque with air-conditioned facilities, making it an ideal place for prayer and reflection. It’s also conveniently located within walking distance to the bus stop, making it easy to access. Highly recommended for those in the area!
Cosy and spacious. Main prayer hall is air-conditioned. Located a bus stop away from Eunos MRT station amongst rows of private terraces. Was recommended here by colleague and client

Located in the cluster of landed properties. Main prayer hall can is air-conditioned. Muslimah section is just right behind the main prayer hall, and is also air conditioned. Washroom is clean. I get the sense that the mosque has a tight knit community of regular worshippers. Was quite packed when I went for my Isya prayer there, with most of the worshippers clad in white top.
Masjid Al Abdul Razak is a peaceful and well-maintained mosque with a welcoming community. The mosque’s facilities are clean and comfortable, making it a great place for prayers and reflection.
Alhamdulilah, a great mosque to pray in. They also recent re-carpeted the mosque as of Nov 2023, feels great.
